game.name: Feathered Run: Worlds
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Feathered Run: Worlds - This is a 4-button platformer runner for accuracy, made in 2D graphics. Embark on an exciting escape across any part of the world, for example, to Antarctica, the desert or the jungle!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Feathered Run: Worlds - This is a 4-button platformer runner for accuracy, made in 2D graphics. Embark on an exciting escape across any part of the world, for example, to Antarctica, the desert or the jungle!

reviewHighlights.text: 2/10 its got local co-op not worth 10$
